resources.string: This activity serves as the main screen for the app. It displays all the songs, playlists, albums and artists available on your phone. It also displays currently playing song along with play/pause and next controls at the bottom.
This activity displays all the playlists user has created along with the default lists - Recently Played and Recently Added; and an option to create a new one.
This activity displays all the songs in the phone grouped according to the artists.
This activity displays all the songs in the phone in an alphabetically sorted manner. It also displays an option to buy new songs.

This activity acts as a full player interface displaying controls such as - Play/Pause, Next, Prev, Progress bar with remaining and elapsed time. It also displays album artwork, song name and artist and album info if available.
To implement payment method one can use PayPal MPL library available here along with an how-to guide.
